title: Maoz Lakovski Articles | Similarweb
description: Looking for articles written by Maoz Lakovski? Check out all of Maoz Lakovski's insightful articles on the Similarweb blog, enter now!
content: HomeBlogMaoz Lakovski Chief Business Officer, Similarweb Maoz Lakovski Maoz is an experienced business strategist, with over a decade of experience in product leadership, general management and business development. Prior to becoming Similarweb’s Chief Business Officer, Maoz held roles as the General Manager of Similarweb’s core digital research and marketing solutions, and as Similarweb’s Head of Strategy. Prior to Similarweb, Maoz served at Twitter in Sales Strategy and Operations. Maoz holds a B.Sc. in Management and Industrial engineering from Tel Aviv University, as well as an MBA from INSEAD. Show more Updates Similarweb Acquires Rank Ranger: Why It’s a Game-Changer for Marketing Professionals Announcements by Maoz Lakovski 3 Min.
